name: Frank Blendinger
what_is_my_connection_to_javascript: I am currently using JS/TS in both my day job as a software engineer, and for private projects. Professionally I mainly support medical companies with their imaging software. This is usually a slow-paced terrain, with lots of legacy applications. But in the recent years customers are asking for mobile / web solutions as well, which leads to many interesting projects.
what_can_i_contribute: Let's see! I love barcamps/unconferences, I'm sure there will be things to talk about. :-)
